# 6.0

## 6.0.2

<span style="font-size: 0.85em; color: gray;">
**Date:** 2025-06-25<br>
**URL:** [https://docs.abcdstudy.org/v6.0.2/](https://docs.abcdstudy.org/v6.0.2/)
</span>

- Some of the [Family, Friends, & Community](../documentation/non_imaging/fc.qmd) summary scores (e.g. MNBS) have some errors (i.e. 777's were not coded as missing), so please note this in analysis.
- Under [Neurocognition NIH Toolbox section](../documentation/non_imaging/nt.qmd), added in Notes and special considerations: In cases with remote administration of the NIH Toolbox (see variable X that indicates remote or in person), the Crystallized Cognition Composite Score is not calculated.

## 6.0.1

<span style="font-size: 0.85em; color: gray;">
**Date:** 2025-06-15<br>
**URL:** [https://docs.abcdstudy.org/v6.0.1/](https://docs.abcdstudy.org/v6.0.1/)
</span>

- Under [Family, Friends, & Community](../documentation/non_imaging/fc.qmd), in the Wills Problem Solving Scale, added note: "Note that some values in the early years for wps_q(1-6)\_y have 0's, which do not map to the data dictionary and need to be filtered out."
- Under [Mental Health CBCL measure](../documentation/non_imaging/mh.qmd), added note: "Based on ASEBA scoring,the DSM and subscale measures have a range \>= 50. The three CBCL Internalizing, Externalizing, and Total Problem scales have a full T-score range with a mean = 50 and SD = 10."
